sentences.sentence: We owe the animals our profoundest apologies.
sentences.translation: 我们对动物怀有最深切的歉意。

sentences.sentence: I thought it was the profoundest joke I'd ever read.
sentences.translation: 我认为这是我读过最深奥的玩笑。

sentences.sentence: Yes. Okay. Very good. Yes. 'The profoundest joke she has ever heard.
sentences.translation: 对，好，非常好，她读过的最深奥的玩笑。
